item.title: About Me
item.description: Father of two incredible kids: Adri√† and Claudia. Runner and free athlete: I think we should care also our body and health, as we care our mind and skills. The mix of these two worlds, makes us better humans. Software Learner: I’ve just realized I was at the wrong path. I’ve just change my mindset. Now I found the right path: happiness, proudness, skillness, the will to learn and share, just being inconformist.
